channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel -- Intel(R) Graphics Drivers
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel -- Intel(R) Graphics Drivers

item.title: CVE-2020-0501|2024-08-04T06:02:52.170Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Buffer overflow in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before version 26.20.100.6912 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0505|2024-08-04T06:02:52.211Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Improper conditions check in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before versions 15.33.49.5100, 15.36.38.5117, 15.40.44.5107, 15.45.30.5103, and 26.20.100.7212 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure and denial of service via local

item.title: CVE-2020-0565|2024-08-04T06:02:52.306Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Uncontrolled search path in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before version 26.20.100.7158 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2020-0514|2024-08-04T06:02:52.198Z -- intel -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20drivers
item.description: Improper default permissions in the installer for Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before versions 26.20.100.7463 and 15.45.30.5103 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

item.description: Improper access control in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before version 26.20.100.7463 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable denial of service via local access.

item.description: Out-of-bounds write in Intel(R) Graphics Drivers before version 15.36.38.5117 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege or denial of service via local access.
